explicit

Interface SCCConsumer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCCConsumerBitSet, SCCConsumerBSCCs, SCCConsumerStore, SCCInfo

    public interface SCCConsumer
    Interface for a consumer of SCC information, for use with an SCCComputer. When a new SCC is discovered, first notifyStartSCC() will be called. Subsequently, for each state of the SCC, notifyStateInSCC() will be called. When all states of the SCC have been notified, notifyEndSCC() will be called. When the whole SCC computation is finished, notifyDone() will be called once.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void notifyDone()
      Call-back function.
      void notifyEndSCC()
      Call-back function, will be called when all states of the SCC have been discovered.
      default void notifyStart(Model model)
      Call-back function, will be called once at the start.
      void notifyStartSCC()
      Call-back function, will be called when a new SCC is discovered.
      void notifyStateInSCC(int stateIndex)
      Call-back function, will be called once for each state in the SCC.

      • notifyDone
